text: Villa Schmitz FacadeThe Villa Schmitz is a historic mansion in Nice, Alpes- Maritimes, France. It was built from 1884 to 1887 for Victoire Schmitz. It was designed by architect Vincent Levrot. It has been listed as an official national monument since October 1, 2010. ==References== Category:Houses completed in 1887 Category:Monuments historiques of Nice
title: Villa Schmitz
